answers.answer: HiWelcome to the MedHelp forum!The hands could be red due to reduced blood supply as in diabetes, carpal tunnel syndrome, chronic fatigue syndrome, poor sleep, smoking, Raynaud’s phenomenon and pinched cervical spinal nerve.Do discuss this with your doctor and get yourself examined. Take care!

question: Have always had slightly red hands for years but recently they are extremely red.  I don't think it is raynards but hope it is not do to liver disease.
title: Cause of Red hands
